result.title: Bringing SGU problems to codeforces (NOT AN ANNOUNCEMENT).
result.content: Any one who has seen SGU agrees with me that it had pretty good problems. So is it possible to bring SGU problems on codeforces. I am aware of the PDF form of the problemset BUT any one who reads problems and tries to solve them wants know that their solution is correct or not. so can anyone bring SGU problems to codeforces (possibly to the gym) and with their Checkers ? if you want the problem set : offline SGU.
